text: "Not Afraid Anymore" is a song recorded by American singer and songwriter Halsey for the soundtrack of the 2017 film Fifty Shades Darker. It was written by Halsey, Jason Quenneville, Nasri Atweh, Adam Messinger and produced by Atweh and Messinger under The Messengers. The song was released on January 13, 2017, by Universal Music Group as the second single from the album. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Australia (ARIA) | 55 |- |- |- ! scope="row"| France (SNEP) | 71 |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Heatseekers (RMNZ) | 1 |- |- |- |- |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| |- ! scope="row"| Various | January 13, 2017 | Digital download | | |} ==References== == External links == * Category:2017 singles Category:2017 songs Category:Halsey (singer) songs Category:Fifty Shades film music Category:Universal Music Group singles Category:Republic Records singles Category:Songs written by Nasri (musician) Category:Songs written by Adam Messinger Category:Song recordings produced by The Messengers (producers) Category:Songs written by Jason Quenneville Category:Songs written by Halsey (singer)
title: Not Afraid Anymore
